name: FConnectionItemStruct
comment: This is a struct that will assign an item to a certain connection. Used by splitters to cycle outputs so all items dont always go to one output

properties.name: Connection
properties.comment: The connection to put the item on

properties.name: Item
properties.comment: The item to put on the connection

properties.name: IndexInInventory
properties.comment: What is our index in the inventory component

properties.name: OffsetBeyond
properties.comment: How far past the conveyor belt length this item is

properties.name: Grabbed
properties.comment: To allow this to be thread safe, this bool marks if a table element has been consumed, to remove the need to delete from the table array

properties.name: mInventorySizeX
properties.comment: The size of the inventory for this attachment. Used to hold a buffer of incoming items

properties.name: mInventorySizeY
properties.comment: The size of the inventory for this storage. Used to hold a buffer of incoming items

properties.name: mBufferInventory
properties.comment: The inventory to store everything in. Don't use this directly, use mStorageInventoryHandler->GetActiveInventoryComponent()

properties.name: mBufferInventoryHandler
properties.comment: Maintainer of the active storage component for this actor. Use this to get the active inventory component.

properties.name: mInputs
properties.comment: Cached input connections for faster lookup.

properties.name: mOutputs
properties.comment: Cached output connections for faster lookup.

properties.name: mCachedInventorySize
properties.comment: Cached linear size of the inventory component
